title: 这段指令到底哪出问题了啊（长指令慎入）
author: 敏感词的锅
txt_content:
/summon minecraft:zombie_horse ~~~ {Passengers:[{id:"minecraft:zombie"{Attributes:[{Name:"generic.max_health",Base:100f}],Health:100f},HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:netherite_sword",Count:1b}],ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:netherite_boots"},{id:"minecraft:netherite_leggings"},{id:"minecraft:netherite_chestplates"},{id:"minecraft:netherite_helmet",Count:1b}]},{id:"minecraft:Skeleton"{Attributes:[{Name:"generic.max_health",Base:100f}],Health:100f},HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:bow{Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:power",lvl:10s},{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:5s},{id:"minecraft:punch",lvl:5s},{id:"minecraft:flame",lvl:1s},{id:"minecraft:infinity",lvl:1s}]},ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:diamond_boots"},{id:"minecraft:diamond_leggings"},{id:"minecraft:diamond_chestplates"},{id:"minecraft:diamond_helmet",Count:1b}]}],{Attributes:[{Name:"generic.max_health",Base:100f}],Health:100f}}复制代码意思是“生成一个骑在一个骑着僵尸马的全套下界合金装备的僵尸上的全套钻石甲持有力量X耐久V冲击V火矢无限的弓的小白（三者血量上限和血量皆为100）”    （僵尸马最下层，僵尸中层，小白顶层）
版本1.16.1

replies.author: Peanutz_OwO
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Peanutz_OwO 于 2020-8-5 15:09 编辑 
/summon minecraft:zombie_horse ~ ~ ~ {Passengers:[{id:"minecraft:zombie",Attributes:[{Name:"generic.max_health",Base:100f}],Health:100f,HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:netherite_sword",Count:1b}],ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:netherite_boots",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:netherite_leggings",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:netherite_chestplate",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:netherite_helmet",Count:1b}],Passengers:[{id:"minecraft:skeleton",Attributes:[{Name:"generic.max_health",Base:100f}],Health:100f,HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:bow",Count:1b,tag:{Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:power",lvl:10},{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:5},{id:"minecraft:punch",lvl:5},{id:"minecraft:flame",lvl:1},{id:"minecraft:infinity",lvl:1}]}}],ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:diamond_boots",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:diamond_leggings",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:diamond_chestplate",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:diamond_helmet",Count:1b}]}]}],Attributes:[{Name:"generic.max_health",Base:100f}],Health:100f}复制代码如果有满足你的需求，不妨给个最佳答案吧。

replies.author: Jokey_钥匙
replies.txt_content:
除了上面几位说的以外
Base的值全是double 后缀用d

replies.author: Ashiel2
replies.txt_content:
啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊，你这个指令问题太多了，解决完一个还有一个，还不如我自己编呢。于是我从12点左右开始查指令，到14点25才编出来，这个257个金粒我觉得值了！啊啊啊啊！！！我快被这个指令搞疯了，啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！！！！
/summon minecraft:zombie_horse ~ ~1 ~ {Health:100,Passengers:[{Health:100,Passengers:[{Health:100,Attributes:[{Name:"generic.maxHealth",Base:100}],HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:bow",Count:1b,tag:{Damage:100,Unbreakable:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:flame",lvl:1},{id:"minecraft:infinity",lvl:1},{id:"minecraft:power",lvl:5},{id:"minecraft:punch",lvl:2},{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:3}]}},{}],ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:diamond_boots",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:diamond_leggings",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:diamond_chestplate",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:diamond_helmet",Count:1b}],id:"minecraft:skeleton"}],Attributes:[{Name:"generic.maxHealth",Base:100}],HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:netherite_sword",Count:1b},{}],ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:netherite_boots",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:netherite_leggings",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:netherite_chestplate",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:netherite_helmet",Count:1b}],id:"minecraft:zombie"}],Attributes:[{Name:"generic.maxHealth",Base:100},{Name:"horse.jumpStrength",Base:2}],Tame:1b}
